languages.text: {n}Арбитес невозмутимо отстегивает часть доспеха, обнажая предплечье.{/n} "Глейто, цель — ДК-1, предупредительная атака". {n}Кибермастиф немедленно впивается в руку хозяина, бешено мотая мордой, и окатывая вас брызгами горячей крови.{/n}

{n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитес невозмутимо отстегивает часть доспеха, обнажая предплечье.{/n} "Глейто, цель — ДК-1, предупредительная атака". {n}Кибермастиф немедленно впивается в руку хозяина, бешено мотая мордой, и окатывая вас брызгами горячей крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target S-A-80, warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff instantly bites down on his master's arm, shaking it back and forth viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

{n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target S-A-80, warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff instantly bites down on his master's arm, shaking it back and forth viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

{n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target S-A-80 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

{n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target S-A-80 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

{n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

{n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼は平然と装甲の一部を外し、残された人間の前腕をさらけ出した。{/n}「グライト、ターゲットDX-1―警告攻撃」{n}サイバーマスチフは一瞬のためらいもなく主人の腕に噛みつき、激しく振り回しながら、あなたの顔に熱い血をまき散らした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は平然と装甲の一部を外し、残された人間の前腕をさらけ出した。{/n}「グライト、ターゲットDX-1―警告攻撃」{n}サイバーマスチフは一瞬のためらいもなく主人の腕に噛みつき、激しく振り回しながら、あなたの顔に熱い血をまき散らした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er entfernt gelassen einen Teil seiner Rüstung und entblößt seinen verbliebenen menschlichen Unterarm.{/n} "Glaito, Ziel DX-1 – Angriff zur Warnung!" {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff beißt ohne Zögern in den Arm seines Herren, schüttelt wild den Kopf und bespritzt dich mit warmen Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er entfernt gelassen einen Teil seiner Rüstung und entblößt seinen verbliebenen menschlichen Unterarm.{/n} "Glaito, Ziel DX-1 – Angriff zur Warnung!" {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff beißt ohne Zögern in den Arm seines Herren, schüttelt wild den Kopf und bespritzt dich mit warmen Blut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il retire son armure avec nonchalance, découvrant son avant-bras organique.{/n} « Glaito, cible DX-1. Morsure d'avertissement. » {n}Sans la moindre hésitation, le cyber-mastiff referme sa mâchoire sur le bras de son maître, avant de secouer sa tête rageusement en faisant jaillir le sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il retire son armure avec nonchalance, découvrant son avant-bras organique.{/n} « Glaito, cible DX-1. Morsure d'avertissement. » {n}Sans la moindre hésitation, le cyber-mastiff referme sa mâchoire sur le bras de son maître, avant de secouer sa tête rageusement en faisant jaillir le sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con aire despreocupado, el Arbitrator se quita una parte de su armadura para dejar al descubierto su único antebrazo humano.{/n} «Glaito, blanco DX-1, ataque de advertencia». {n}El cibermastín cierra las fauces en torno al brazo de su amo sin titubear, zarandeándolo vigorosamente y salpicándote de sangre cálida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con aire despreocupado, el Arbitrator se quita una parte de su armadura para dejar al descubierto su único antebrazo humano.{/n} «Glaito, blanco DX-1, ataque de advertencia». {n}El cibermastín cierra las fauces en torno al brazo de su amo sin titubear, zarandeándolo vigorosamente y salpicándote de sangre cálida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙漫不经心地卸下了自己的臂甲，露出了残存的前臂。{/n}“格雷托，目标DX-1，警戒攻击。”{n}随着一声令下，格雷托毫不犹豫地咬住了它主人的手臂，恶狠狠地撕扯着。索罗蒙的鲜血喷到了你身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙漫不经心地卸下了自己的臂甲，露出了残存的前臂。{/n}“格雷托，目标DX-1，警戒攻击。”{n}随着一声令下，格雷托毫不犹豫地咬住了它主人的手臂，恶狠狠地撕扯着。索罗蒙的鲜血喷到了你身上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soğuk kanlı bir şekilde zırhının bir parçasını çıkarıyor, insan ön kolu ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Glaito, hedef DX-1. Uyarı saldırısı." {n}Siber mastif; tereddüt etmeden efendisinin kolunu ısırıyor, şiddetle sallıyor ve üzerine sıcak kan sıçratıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He nonchalantly removes a piece of his armour, baring his remaining human forearm.{/n} "Glaito, target DX-1 — warning attack." {n}The cyber-mastiff bites down on his master's arm without hesitation, shaking it about viciously and spraying you with hot blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soğuk kanlı bir şekilde zırhının bir parçasını çıkarıyor. İnsan ön kolu ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Glaito, hedef DX-1. Uyarı saldırısı." {n}Siber mastif tereddüt etmeden efendisinin kolunu ısırıyor, şiddetle sallıyor ve üzerine sıcak kan sıçratıyor.{/n}
